informationPage.title: Information
informationPage.content:
Ted attended the University of New Mexico where he studied philosophy and psychology. He also studied at the University of Sheffield where he developed an interest in aesthetics and formal logic. Tedâ€™s education, coupled with his passion for the arts, was the beginning of his professional career in creative design and web development.

Today, Ted lives in Albuquerque, NM and is enjoying his fifth year of satisfying work at K2MD in Albuquerque NM. Away from agency life, he continues to improve his rock climbing skills.
